root_causes: Many of the described validation checks are only documented in narrative and implemented as plain LIST outputs without SELECT IF filters to flag only problematic cases (so they do not actually detect/return invalid cases).
The DK mutual-exclusivity check is incomplete/truncated in the script and does not explicitly test whether any other A4x2_* codes are selected when DK is selected.
The minimum-selection (MultiItemsSelectedMinimum = 1 when DK not selected) logic is mentioned but not implemented with a complete SELECT IF condition to flag when no codes are selected.
The OE-converse check (open-text present but OE code A4x2_5 NOT selected) is not implemented as a filtered SELECT IF â€” only a LIST of the variables is shown, so it won't isolate invalid responses.
The CheckMultiOpenD1 behavior (flag open-text in non-selected items like A4x2_1_other..A4x2_4_other) is not implemented as conditional SELECT IF checks; only unfiltered LISTs are provided.
The script does not explicitly ensure validations run only when the question was displayed/answered (the expected 'if( f('A4x2').toBoolean() )' behavior).
instructions: Implement explicit SELECT IF/filters for each validation so only problem cases are returned. Example template for DK mutual-exclusivity: SELECT IF ((A4DKx2_99 = 1 OR A4DKx2 = 1) AND SUM(A4x2_1, A4x2_2, A4x2_3, A4x2_4, A4x2_5) > 0). LIST respid ... .
Implement the minimum-selection check when DK NOT selected: SELECT IF ((NOT (A4DKx2_99 = 1 OR A4DKx2 = 1)) AND SUM(A4x2_1, A4x2_2, A4x2_3, A4x2_4, A4x2_5) = 0). LIST respid ... .
Implement the OE selected but open/missing/too-short check exactly: SELECT IF (A4x2_5 = 1 AND (MISSING(A4x2_5_other) OR LENGTH(RTRIM(A4x2_5_other)) < 5)). LIST respid A4x2_5 A4x2_5_other .

Implement the OE-converse check (OE text present but OE code not selected): SELECT IF ((NOT MISSING(A4x2_5_other) AND LENGTH(RTRIM(A4x2_5_other)) > 0) AND (A4x2_5 NE 1)). LIST respid A4x2_5 A4x2_5_other .

Implement CheckMultiOpenD1: SELECT IF ( (NOT MISSING(A4x2_1_other) AND A4x2_1 NE 1) OR (NOT MISSING(A4x2_2_other) AND A4x2_2 NE 1) OR (NOT MISSING(A4x2_3_other) AND A4x2_3 NE 1) OR (NOT MISSING(A4x2_4_other) AND A4x2_4 NE 1) ). LIST respid ... .

Ensure checks only run when the question was displayed/answered (replicate if(f('A4x2').toBoolean())). Practically, wrap checks or add a precondition such as: run validations when SUM(A4x2_1..A4x2_5) > 0 OR any of the *_other fields are non-missing, or when the survey's display flag variable indicates the question was shown.

Confirm DK variable names in the data (A4DKx2 vs A4DKx2_99). If both naming conventions might appear, include both in conditions as done in the narrative. If special codes 97/98/99 are used for other meanings, include explicit handling for them as required.
